name: Arko Corp
description: Arko Corp is a leading convenience store and fuel retailer in the United States, recognized for its expansive network of locations and commitment to customer service. Established in 2020, Arko operates through a series of subsidiaries, including its flagship brand, GPM Investments, which manages a vast portfolio of convenience stores across the country. The company focuses on providing high-quality products and services, including fuel, groceries, snacks, and beverages, catering to the diverse needs of its customers. With a strategic emphasis on growth through acquisitions, Arko has rapidly expanded its footprint, becoming one of the largest operators in the convenience store sector. The company is dedicated to leveraging technology and innovation to enhance the shopping experience, streamline operations, and improve customer engagement. Arko's mission is centered around delivering exceptional value to its customers while maintaining a strong commitment to community involvement and sustainability. The company continues to explore new market opportunities, positioning itself as a driving force in the evolving retail landscape.
